name: plugin-2
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.dist: yarn run build && xcopy /y manifest.json .\dist\ && xcopy /y main.js .\dist\ && xcopy /y styles.css .\dist\
scripts.install: yarn run build && xcopy /s/y dist D:\Dropbox\.obsidian\plugins\plugin-2\
